Press {g:citadel_binding:ne:drk:'Mantle'} to climb over obstacles. (plus dark)
Dark, Light, and Neutral _styles_ (as opposed to SIAPI Icon Styles)
Move Up In Spectator Mode with {g:citadel_binding:'SpectatorControls.SpectatorFlyUp'}.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'AbilityMelee'} to perform a melee attack.
Use {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to activate your first ability.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to use your second ability.
Use {g:citadel_binding:'Ability4'} to trigger your fourth ability.
Use {g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} for an alternate ability cast.
Watch your last death replay with {g:citadel_binding:'ReplayDeath'}.
